DOC.brief_title: The Role Intravitreal Glucose Macular Thinning Following Surgery Retinal Detachment Epimacular Membrane
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison intravitreous glucose rate macular thinning measure OCT 3 month post vitrectomy retinal detachment epimacular membrane . The cohort divide 2 group , one thin macular measurement 190µm , others 190µm . We look correlation increase glucose rate decrease macular thickness .
DOC.criteria: patient underwent vitrectomy retinal detachment epimacular membrane patient suffer diabetes , recurrence retinal detachment , agerelated macular degeneration , post surgical macular oedema
